frontmatter.title: New Ideas from Dead Economists: Maynard Keynes
frontmatter.short: Keynes provided an alternate school of thought and a solution. Keynes introduced the idea of marginal propensity to consume; a number that indicates a persons likeliness to spend an extra dollar. He used this to develop his solution, government spending on public resources so as to fill the gap left by consumption and investment.
frontmatter.keywords: data science programming, datascientist, job of data scientist, data driven insights, data driven solutions
